name: cardboard turtle
description:
A simple cardboard turtle made from stacked cardboard. Legs go through the body and hold everything together. The turtle has had a few too many cannolis, so its feet don't quite touch the ground.

This is just a quick test file, I'll be tweaking it and uploading new versions as I explore Thingiverse's capabilities...
instructions: The cardboard I used is about .13" thick. You'll need to adjust the square holes and the leg bars to accommodate different sizes or materials. You should see three different colors in the files. Blue is the rectangular outline of the material. Red is the design to be engraved (or cut lightly), black is the outline to be cut out completely. You may need to save each color to a different file, depending on your laser. That's why the blue rectangle is there, so that you can realign each layer in your laser cutter software.
